name: ElasticExportBelboonDE
license: GNU AFFERO GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 3, 19 November 2007
description: This plugin adds the format BelboonDE-Plugin to the Elastic Export.

shortDescription.de: Die Integration des Datenformats BelboonDE-Plugin ermöglicht die Artikeldatenübertragung zum Affiliate-Dienstleister belboon über den elastischen Export.
shortDescription.en: The integration of the data format BelboonDE-Plugin enables the transfer of item data to the affiliate service provider belboon via the elastic export.

author: plentysystems AG
